advancement.stone_age.craft_crafting_tab: You may now craft the regular crafting table.
advancement.stone_age.craft_cured_hide.d: Use some salt on rawhide to cure it (rot prevention).
advancement.stone_age.craft_cutting_stum: Cut some wood into planks using a cutting stump. You may also cut planks into sticks.
Craft a DryingRack to dry your TannedHide.
advancement.stone_age.craft_flint_hatche: Craft a FlintHatchet to chop wood.
advancement.stone_age.craft_flint_sickle: Craft a FlintSickle to harvest PlantFiber from grass.
advancement.stone_age.craft_pottery_kiln: Craft a PotteryKiln and place a campfire under it to fire clay items.
Put your CuredHide in a ClayTub filled with water to soak it. This will take a while.
advancement.stone_age.craft_strainer.des: Craft a Strainer and put gravel in it to get more Flints. You'll need to shake it manually.
Put your SoakedHide in a ClayTub filled with water, drop some WoodBark in it, and wait a while to tan it.
advancement.stone_age.craft_trapper_knif: Craft a TrapperKnife to transform AnimalSkin into Rawhide.
advancement.stone_age.craft_wicker.title: The Wicker
advancement.stone_age.craft_wicker_baske: Craft a WickerBasket to store items.
advancement.stone_age.fire_clay_tub.desc: Craft an UnfiredClayTub and place it into a PotteryKiln to get your first ClayTub.
advancement.stone_age.get_animal_skin.de: Hunt down an animal to get it skin (regular Leather drop is disabled).
advancement.stone_age.get_flint_flake.de: Knap a Flint on top of a Stone block to get a FlintFlake.
advancement.stone_age.get_leather.title: At last, leather !
advancement.stone_age.get_leather.descri: Put your TannedHide on a DryingRack to dry it and finally get Leather !
advancement.stone_age.get_plant_fiber.de: Gather some PlantFiber from grass using your newly crafted Sickle.
advancement.stone_age.get_rawhide.title: Rawhide
advancement.stone_age.get_rawhide.descri: Use your TrapperKnife on an AnimalSkin to get Rawhide.
advancement.stone_age.get_salt.title: Pepper ?
advancement.stone_age.get_salt.descripti: Put some water in a ClayTub and wait for it to evaporate. You can place a campfire under it to speed up the process.
advancement.stone_age.get_sharpened_flin: While having FlintFlakes on your secondary hand, use a Whetstone to sharpen it.
advancement.stone_age.get_whetstone.desc: While straining gravel, you may get a Whetstone. You'll need it to sharpen your tools.
advancement.stone_age.get_wood_bark.desc: Use any Axe on a log to strip it and get some WoodBark
advancement.stone_age.mine_granite_with_: Granite deposits contains Whetstones. Find them for a better source of Whetstones.
advancement.stone_age.root.title: Sheltercraft
advancement.stone_age.root.description: Welcome to Sheltercraft ! To get started, gather some flint from gravel.
